div.div: Performance indicators in fisheries management scenarios.
div.p: Change in yearly profits (2020–2032) of bottom trawlers (A), pelagic trawlers (B) and of the whole fishery (C) and in the spawning stock biomass indicator of cod (D), herring (E) and sprat (F) relative to the average modelled value of 2011–2013 by EwE (brown), Gadget (blue) and MSPM (purple). Dots correspond to the mean and bars to the full range of values. Please note that Gadget does not provide information on clupeid-related indicators in the ‘Piscivore Exploitation’ (PE) scenario (see Methods).
